value: File:Hilltop Buddha at the southern end of Jade Taw bay 24.jpg

Can reached by overland or by air. Three airlines (Air Mandalay, Air Bagan, and Yangon Airways) provide air services to Thandwe about 6km from Ngapali Beach.

value: Clay Pottery works at Kinmaw village
Hand weaving works of Rakhine longyi are based in Thandwe

content=A boutique hotel on Ngapali Beach. 45 deluxe bungalows and rooms including 2 suites are all either directly on the beach or in a beautiful exotic garden under palm trees. Enjoy the Sunset Bar and the restaurant, The Catch, offering fine dining, serving international and Asian cuisine and also the freshest fish and seafood accompanied by a large variety of carefully chosen wines.
content=26 bungalows, all on the beach front. Has restaurant.
